mapper.insert: insert into member(m_id, m_name, m_pwd, m_dept, m_posit, m_email_id, m_email_do, m_cell, m_com_date) values (#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_pwd}, #{m_dept}, #{m_posit}, #{m_email_id}, #{m_email_do}, #{m_cell}, #{m_com_date})
mapper.update: update member_signimg set ms_img=#{ms_img} where ms_id=#{m_id}
mapper.select: select ms_img from member_signimg where ms_id=#{m_id}
select count(*) from member where m_id=#{m_id} and m_pwd=#{m_pwd}
select * from member_signimg join approve on member_signimg.ms_id = approve.a_id where a_num = #{d_num} and a_condition is true ORDER BY a_cnt ASC
